view.label: SAI Hosts
view.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_5JXYBByr":{"type":"viz.singlevalue","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_W7Rm7rpK"},"title":"# Active Hosts"},"viz_qzmS2p9n":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_7vLqEFwp"},"title":"CPU Utilization","description":"user + system"},"viz_xUPOti9r":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_HZubjkgb"},"title":"Total Disk Space"},"viz_DljIBp37":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_wlyaGNkH"},"title":"Total Memory"},"viz_cx4xY67T":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"title":"Top CPU Utilization","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_CxdPvaB5"}},"viz_yRZcN6Y9":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_xF2y2PFn","legend.placement":"bottom"},"title":"Disk IO ops"},"viz_xQBsrpE2":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_07CrGSeS","legend.placement":"bottom"},"title":"Memory Utilization","description":"Percentile Distribution"},"viz_fEmS8ABh":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_7RRSGYMB"},"title":"Total Network IO"},"viz_7EeaQsmg":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_B5OskPYq"},"title":"Network Errors"},"viz_tx3W9254":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_G3YeVU5F"},"title":"Host Details"},"viz_3cAdvOdv":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_yzpHWhtx_ds_B5OskPYq"},"title":"Dropped Packets"}},"dataSources":{"ds_W7Rm7rpK":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.user") where index=em_metrics by host | stats dc(host)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"number of hosts"},"ds_7vLqEFwp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.user") as "cpu.user" avg("cpu.system") as "cpu.system" where index=em_metrics host IN ($host$) by host span=$span$ | eval cpu.utilization='cpu.user'+'cpu.system' 
| timechart avg("cpu.utilization") as avg_utilization span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"cpu utilization"},"ds_HZubjkgb":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum("df.free") as "df.free" sum("df.used") as "df.used" WHERE index="em_metrics" host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"total disk"},"ds_wlyaGNkH":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum("memory.free") as "memory.free" sum("memory.used") as "memory.used" sum("memory.buffered") as "memory.buffered" sum("memory.cached") as "memory.cached" WHERE index="em_metrics" host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"total memory used"},"ds_CxdPvaB5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.user") as "cpu.user" avg("cpu.system") as "cpu.system" where index=em_metrics host IN ($host$) by host span=$span$ | eval cpu.utilization='cpu.user'+'cpu.system' 
| chart sparkline avg("cpu.utilization") as cpu.utilization by host
| sort - cpu.utilization
| table sparkline host cpu.utilization"},"name":"top cpu utilization"},"ds_xF2y2PFn":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(disk.ops.write) as disk.write avg(disk.ops.read) as disk.read WHERE index=em_metrics host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"disk io ops"},"ds_07CrGSeS":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as mean max(_value) as max min(_value) as min perc10(_value) as p10 perc50(_value) as p50 perc90(_value) as p90 WHERE index=em_metrics metric_name="memory.used" host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"percentile memory utilization"},"ds_7RRSGYMB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("interface.packets.tx") as "packets transferred" avg("interface.packets.rx") as "packets received" where index=em_metrics host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"network_io"},"ds_B5OskPYq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("interface.errors.rx") as "errors.rx" avg("interface.errors.tx") as "errors.tx" WHERE index="em_metrics" host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"Total Network Errors"},"ds_G3YeVU5F":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.user") where index=em_metrics by host os os_version service | table host os os_version service"},"name":"Host Details"},"ds_yzpHWhtx_ds_B5OskPYq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("interface.dropped.rx") as "dropped.rx" avg("interface.dropped.tx") as "dropped.tx" WHERE index="em_metrics" host IN ($host$) span=$span$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"total dropped packets"},"ds_4Y5K9Dv3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.user") where index=em_metrics by host | table host"},"name":"host list"}},"inputs":{"host_input":{"type":"input.custom_multiselect","title":"Host(s)","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"host","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_4Y5K9Dv3"}},"input_resolution":{"options":{"defaultValue":"5m","token":"span"},"type":"input.text","title":"Resolution"},"time_input":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-4h,now","token":"timerange"},"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range"}},"layout":{"globalInputs":["host_input","input_resolution","time_input"],"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1200},"structure":[{"item":"viz_5JXYBByr","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":260,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_qzmS2p9n","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":290,"w":380,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_xUPOti9r","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":570,"w":390,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_DljIBp37","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":290,"w":390,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_cx4xY67T","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":290,"w":390,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_yRZcN6Y9","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":570,"w":390,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_xQBsrpE2","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":570,"w":380,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_fEmS8ABh","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":840,"w":380,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_7EeaQsmg","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":840,"w":390,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_tx3W9254","type":"block","position":{"x":280,"y":10,"w":910,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_3cAdvOdv","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":840,"w":390,"h":260}}]},"description":"","title":"SAI Hosts"}
